mapper.select: SELECT p.pur_id, p.purdate, i.purinf_id, i.pur_cnt, s.price, (i.pur_cnt * s.price) as total, i.wanted_date, s.sales_id, d.deliverStatus , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_purchaseinfo si WHERE si.pur_id = p.pur_id ) as item_cnt FROM tb_purchase p INNER JOIN tb_purchaseinfo i ON i.pur_id = p.pur_id INNER JOIN tb_sales s ON i.sales_id = s.sales_id LEFT JOIN tb_delivdir d ON i.purinf_id = d.purinf_id WHERE p.loginID = #{loginID} AND s.model_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') AND p.purdate > #{dateStart} AND p.purdate < #{dateEnd} GROUP BY i.pur_id ORDER BY p.pur_id desc LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageBlockSize}

WHERE p.loginID = #{loginID} AND s.model_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') AND p.purdate > #{dateStart} AND p.purdate < #{dateEnd} GROUP BY i.pur_id ) as a
